data.objective: MEDIANEST MAIN BRANCH MODERNIZATION PROJECT: Systematically migrate production-ready code from claude-flow2 branch to main branch through logical PR groupings. PR-1 COMPLETED: Foundation infrastructure (85 files, Docker, CI/CD, PostgreSQL/Redis, workspace config, production .gitignore) successfully deployed. CURRENT OBJECTIVE - PR-2: Backend Core Architecture: Analyze claude-flow2 branch backend code, extract and migrate core TypeScript backend components including Express server setup, PostgreSQL database integration, authentication system, API routing structure, error handling middleware, security configurations, and essential testing framework. Create clean, production-ready backend that integrates seamlessly with established PR-1 infrastructure while maintaining strict separation from development tooling (Claude Flow, .roo). End goal: Production-ready main branch with systematic, logical code organization suitable for enterprise deployment.
